item.title: High-throughput Chemistry
item.description: Open source python packages for automating molecular workflows

item.title: Conjugated Polymers
item.description: In macromolecules, there are numerous examples where structure dictates function including electronic conductivity of conjugated polymer materials. To elucidate the structure of doped and excited conjugated polymers we developed a multiscale model that captures electronic structure rearrangement and stochastically generates polymer chain conformations.

item.title: Elastic Tensor ML
item.description: Machine learning models for predicting the bulk modulus of materials
